ingredients: 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon onion powder, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon dried parsley,   +   1/2 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 4  boneless, skinless chicken breast halves,   +   1/4 cup duck sauce,   +   1/4 cup marinara sauce, 1 teaspoon mango hot sauce,   +   3/4 cup fresh pink grapefruit juice, divided, 1 cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs, 1  ripe nectarine, pitted and sliced
nutrition: Total Fat 4g 5%, Saturated Fat 1g 3%, Cholesterol 68mg 23%, Sodium 1240mg 54%, Total Carbohydrate 38g 14%, Dietary Fiber 2g 9%, Total Sugars 12g, Protein 33g, Vitamin C 23mg 115%, Calcium 73mg 6%, Iron 3mg 18%, Potassium 517mg 11%
